about.description: 17-year-old computer science student from Latvia specializing in full-stack development, and passionate about creating efficient web applications.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Since 2021, I've gained programming experience through olympiads, projects, freelancing, and coding challenges. These experiences improved my problem-solving skills and expanded my tech knowledge. I am ready to make an effective contribution to the future of programming.
